Wisdom: نَوْمٌ عَلَى يَقِينٍ خَيْرٌ مِنْ صَلَاةٍ فِي شَكٍّ
enWisdom: Sleeping with certitude is better than praying while in doubt
Certitude is the best [means of] indifference towards [the pleasures of] this world
Certitude is the gown of the sagacious
Certitude is the gown of the sagacious
Enviable is the one whose certitude is strong

Wisdom: تَجَلْبَبِ الصَّبْرَ وَالْيَقِينَ فَإِنَّهُمَا نِعْمَ الْعُدَّةُ فِي الرَّخَاءِ وَالشِّدَّةِ
enWisdom: Dress yourself with patience and certainty, for these two are good provisions in [both] comfort and hardship

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ بُوشِرَ قَلْبُهُ بِبَرْدِ الْيَقِينِ
enWisdom: Blessed is one in whose heart the coolness [and tranquillity] of certitude is made to enter

Wisdom: مَا أَعْظَمَ سَعَادَةَ مَنْ بُوشِرَ قَلْبُهُ بِبَرْدِ الْيَقِينِ
enWisdom: How great is the felicity of one whose heart is filled with the coolness of certitude

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْأُمُورِ مَا أَسْفَرَ عَنِ الْيَقِينِ
enWisdom: The best matters are those which give rise to certitude
